description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Parachute jumping has become a popular sport with 30 clubs and 800 members; the first coalition between the two Christian Democrat parties; swearing in of the new Federal Chancellor Kiesinger and his cabinet; work of a German doctor in the Andes; popularity of mini golf; a six-year-old chess champion; a popular jazz singing group.
